title: COSTA RICA TOUR
description: An eco-tourist's dream, Costa Rica has become synonymous with all an unspoiled tropical paradise can be. Rarely does reality measure up to hype, but Costa Rica certainly comes close. The country's quiet history as a backwater free of colonial excesses has today become a boon, and Costa Rica has cashed in on its purity. And not without merit: blessed with beaches and biodiversity, this is a verdant land of misty volcanoes, roaring rivers, and lush jungles teeming with exotic fauna. Throw in the friendly, educated Ticos (as Costa Ricans are known) and you can see why down here they call it Pura Vida

title: HONEYMOON PACKAGE
description: If you are planning your first romantic vacation, then we have loads of honeymoon packages on offer. title: EUROPE NIGHTMARE
description: After a sluggish start, the European Union’s vaccination campaign finally picked up the pace. By mid-May, the EU’s rate of vaccination was broadly in line with the U.S. and the U.K. after having trailed both for months. It also clinched a deal with Pfizer-BioNTech for a further 1.8 billion doses through to 2023 and hopes to conclude negotiations with the U.S. biotechnology company Novavax soon

title: SRIMANGAL TOUR
description: Tourists like to visit various spots such as the Tea Research Institute, Wildlife Service Foundation, Hail Haor, Bird Park and numerous other attractions in Sreemangal. PHOTO: MINTU DESHWARA. Tourism in Sreemangal upazila of Moulvibazar has started to bounce back after suffering massive losses from the coronavirus pandemic that has affected almost all sectors of the economy. Traders in the area are very pleased with the increasing number of tourists and believe that business in the sector will continue to improve if people follow the health regulations to steer clear of infections.

title: KERAAA TOUR
description: Kerala Travel Guidelines - Fully vaccinated tourists do not require an RTPCR Report. All the major Hotels, Resorts & Houseboats are allowed to function, except in Containment Zones. Ministry of tourism, Safety & Hygiene Protocols and Operational Recommendations for Tourism Service Providers are followed by Resorts and Hotels.It is compulsory for guests visiting Kerala should have at least one dose of COVID-19 vaccine before two weeks *OR* Who are in possession of RT-PCR negative certificate taken 72 hours before arrival to Kerala tourism destinations *OR* Who is in possession of COVID-19 positive results more than a month old
